Title: Mutually Assured Destruction
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (creator), Joel Fields, Joseph Weisberg, Sneha Koorse (staff writer), Mike Batistick (staff writer)
Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Maximiliano HernÃ¡ndez, Holly Taylor
Plot: A German assassin has been ordered to kill American scientists involved in the ABM program. After the mission is aborted, Phillip and Elizabeth must stop him and prevent a possible war, without having any idea of his identity.
